EntryName	PAQR4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Progestin and adipoQ receptor family member 4 (Progestin and adipoQ receptor family member IV)
GeneName	PAQR4
Length	198
Function	Plays a role in maintaining adipose tissue function through the regulation of ceramide levels (PubMed:32291319, PubMed:38961186). Mediates the stability of ceramide synthetases, CERS2 and CERS5, and their activities (Probable).
